taskDescription: Aufgabe:Ordne die Wörter aus dem Pool sinnvoll zu, indem Du den Kontext beachtest. (3/6)
textField: quid autem reperiri tam eximium aut tam expetendum potest quam *istam virtutem : Demonstrativpronomen + ...*, *moderationem animi*, temperantiam [...] in luce Asiae, in oculis *clarissimae provinciae* atque in auribus omnium *gentium ac nationum* esse positam?
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
